name: Maize - Harvest Edition LD52
description:
You are the driver of a maize harvester. Unfortunately, a jester has planted the maize in maze patterns. This makes your job difficult! On each field harvest all the maize. Time is maize!

Your harvester speeds up when harvesting and slows down on empty patches. If you steer well, you maintain speed, and loose speed if you don’t steer well. Don’t get stuck.

By Rafael Hernández Pereira for 2023 Ludum Dare 52.

Using Unity (game), Logoist (graphics), Monodraw (level), iPad Apps (music), Barriecito (font), …

All graphics, music and game specific coding created during game jam.

Using a few generic self developed libraries: general game loop, graph, grid logic, level load from text file, messages, pooling, …

No animation, no sound effects, no feel effects, a few glitches, limited game play, … 48 hours is not much time
